title: Exquisite Diamond-Studded Gold Kangan (కడియం)
materials: VS clarity Diamonds. Boasts a rich
long-lasting Hyderabadi Polish for an unparalleled luster.
features: This stunning kangan showcases a three-row design, each row featuring carefully placed diamonds in a prong setting. The intricate lattice-like design allows light to dance through the diamonds, maximizing their brilliance. Features a secure, easy-to-use clasp mechanism for comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly Yellow Gold with dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: and other special occasions. Its versatility makes it suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies and contemporary celebrations.
description: A timeless investment piece, this kangan combines the enduring appeal of 22K gold with the undeniable sparkle of high-quality diamonds. The meticulous craftsmanship and superior materials ensure lasting beauty and value. A statement of elegance and sophistication, perfect for heirloom jewelry collections.
